 11#ifndef VSIP_CORE_EXPR_UNARY_BLOCK_HPP
 12#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_UNARY_BLOCK_HPP

 14#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 15#include <vsip/core/dense_fwd.hpp>
 16#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>

 21namespace vsip_csl

 23namespace expr

 25
 26/// Unary expression block type.
 27///
 28/// Template parameters:
 29///   :Operation: Unary operation. Parametrized on value-type
 30///               for elementwise operation, or on block otherwise.
 31///   :Block: The argument block.
 32///   :Elementwise: True if this is an elementwise operation.
 33template <template <typename> class Operation,
 34	  typename Block,
 35	  bool Elementwise = false>
 36class Unary;
 37
 38/// Unary expression block specialization for elementwise operations.
 39template <template <typename> class Operation, typename Block>
 40class Unary<Operation, Block, true> : impl::Non_assignable
 41{
 42  typedef typename Block::value_type argument_type;
 43  typedef Operation<argument_type> operation_type;
 44
 45public:
 46  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
 47  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
 48
 49  typedef value_type& reference_type;
 50  typedef value_type const& const_reference_type;
 51  typedef typename Block::map_type map_type;
 52
 53  Unary(Block const& block) : block_(block) {}
 54  Unary(operation_type const &op, Block const &block)
 55    : operation_(op), block_(block) {}
 56
 57  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return block_.size();}
 58  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 59  { return block_.size(block_dim, d);}
 60  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 61  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 62  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return block_.map();}
 63
 64  operation_type const &operation() const { return operation_;}
 65  Block const &arg() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return block_;}
 66
 67  value_type get(index_type i) const
 68  { return this->operation()(this->arg().get(i));}
 69  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
 70  { return this->operation()(this->arg().get(i, j));}
 71  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
 72  { return this->operation()(this->arg().get(i, j, k));}
 73
 74private:
 75  Operation<argument_type> operation_;
 76  typename impl::View_block_storage<Block>::expr_type block_;
 77};
 78
 79
 80/// Unary expression block specialization for non-elementwise operations.
 81template <template <typename> class Operation,
 82	  typename Block>
 83class Unary<Operation, Block, false> : public impl::Non_assignable
 84{
 85public:
 86  static dimension_type const dim = Operation<Block>::dim;
 87  typedef typename Operation<Block>::result_type value_type;
 88
 89  typedef value_type &reference_type;
 90  typedef value_type const &const_reference_type;
 91  typedef typename Block::map_type map_type;
 92
 93  typedef Dense<Operation<Block>::dim,
 94		typename Operation<Block>::result_type> cache_type;
 95
 96  Unary(Operation<Block> const &op) : operation_(op) {}
 97  Unary(Unary const &b) : operation_(b.operation_), cache_(b.cache_) {}
 98
 99  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.size();}
100  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
101  { return operation_.size(block_dim, d);}
102  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
103  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
104  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.map();}
105
106  Operation<Block> const &operation() const { return operation_;}
107  Block const &arg() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg();}
108
109  value_type get(index_type i) const
110  { 
111    evaluate();
112    return cache_->get(i);
113  }
114  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
115  { 
116    evaluate();
117    return cache_->get(i, j);
118  }
119  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
120  { 
121    evaluate();
122    return cache_->get(i, j, k);
123  }
124
125  /// Evaluate the operation to make this type usable as an ordinary block.
126  void evaluate() const
127  {
128    if (!cache_.get())
129    {
130      cache_.reset(new cache_type(impl::block_domain<dim>(operation_)));
131      operation_.apply(*(cache_.get()));
132    }
133  }
134  /// Evaluate the operation into the given result block.
135  template <typename ResultBlock>
136  void apply(ResultBlock &result) const
137  {
138    // If this expression was already evaluated,
139    // just copy the cached result.
140    if (cache_.get()) impl::assign<dim>(result, *cache_);
141    else operation_.apply(result);
142  }
143
144  typename cache_type::const_data_type impl_data() const 
145  {
146    evaluate();
147    return cache_->impl_data();
148  }
149  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const
150  {
151    evaluate();
152    return cache_->impl_stride(block_dim, d);
153  }
154
155private:
156  Operation<Block> operation_;
157  mutable impl::Ref_counted_ptr<cache_type> cache_;
158};
159
160} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
161} // namespace vsip_csl

167namespace expr = vsip_csl::expr;
168
169/// Specialize Is_expr_block for unary expr blocks.
170template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
171struct Is_expr_block<expr::Unary<O, B, E> >
172{ static bool const value = true; };
173
174/// Specialize View_block_storage to control how views store unary
175/// expression blocks.
176template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
177struct View_block_storage<expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
178  : By_value_block_storage<expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
179{};
180
181/// Use of non-const expr::Unary<> is an error.
182template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
183struct View_block_storage<expr::Unary<O, B, E> > 
184{};
185
186/// DDA on a non-elementwise Unary works via its cache.
187template <template <typename> class O, typename A>
188struct Block_layout<expr::Unary<O, A> const>
189  : Block_layout<typename expr::Unary<O, A>::cache_type>
190{
191};

194/***********************************************************************
195  Parallel traits and functions
196***********************************************************************/
197
198template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
199struct Distributed_local_block<expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
200{
201  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, E> const
202  type;
203  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::proxy_type, E> const
204  proxy_type;
205};
206
207  template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
208struct Distributed_local_block<expr::Unary<O, B, E> >
209{
210  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, E> 
211  type;
212  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::proxy_type, E>
213  proxy_type;
214};
215
216template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
217expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, true>
218get_local_block(expr::Unary<O, B, true> const &block)
219{
220  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, true>
221    block_type;
222
223  return block_type(get_local_block(block.arg()));
224}
225
226template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
227expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, false>
228get_local_block(expr::Unary<O, B, false> const &block)
229{
230  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, false>
231    block_type;
232  typename O<B>::local_type local_operation(block.operation().local());
233  block_type local_block(local_operation);
234  return local_block;
235}
236
237
238template <typename                  CombineT,
239	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
240struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
241{
242  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, B>::tree_type,
243		      E> const tree_type;
244  typedef tree_type type;
245};
246
247
248
249template <typename                  CombineT,
250	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
251struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> >
252  : Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
253{};
254
255template <typename                  CombineT,
256	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
257typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>::type
258apply_combine(CombineT const &combine, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const &block)
259{
260  typedef typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
261    expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>::type
262    block_type;
263
264  return block_type(apply_combine(combine, block.arg()));
265}
266
267template <typename                  VisitorT,
268	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
269void
270apply_leaf(VisitorT const &visitor,
271	   expr::Unary<O, B, E> const& block)
272{
273  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg());
274}
275
276template <dimension_type D,
277	  typename M,
278	  template <typename> class O, typename B>
279struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
280{
281  typedef expr::Unary<O, B, true> const block_type;
282
283  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
284  {
285    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, B>::value(map, block.arg());
286  }
287};
288
289template <dimension_type D,
290	  typename M,
291	  template <typename> class O, typename B>
292struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Unary<O, B, false> const>
293{
294  typedef expr::Unary<O, B, false> const block_type;
295
296  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
297  {
298    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, O<B> >::value(map, block.operation());
299  }
300};
301
302template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
303struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
304{
305  static bool const value = Is_par_reorg_ok<B>::value;
306};
307
308template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
309struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Unary<O, B, false> const>
310{
311  static bool const value = false;
312};
